text: Marcello Bazzana (born 4 July 1953) is an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1976 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Marcello Bazzana
